Uses of Package
grith.sibboleth

Packages that use grith.sibboleth
grith.sibboleth Sibboleth client library 
 

Classes in grith.sibboleth used by grith.sibboleth
CredentialManager
          An interface to be able to connect to the CredentialManager Python object from the sibboleth.credentials module.
IdpObject
          Along with the Shibboleth and CredentialManager classes/interfaces a central part of sibboleth, it holds a list of IdPs and traverses through levels of IdPs as the user navigates through them.
ShibbolethClient
          Interface that is needed for the whole (j/p)ython - Java wrapping.
ShibListener
          Interface that can be used to monitor the login process.
ShibLoginEventSource
          Used for the (j/p)ython - Java wrapping.
